entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
